author: bsunanda
body: This is in view of disappearance of RECO data. Need AlCaRecoSelector for calibrating HB/HE with muons. This is in preparation for calibration of 2017 data. Data volume required is ~1.6 TB per 1 /fb integrated luminosity with the latest correction
title: bsunanda:Run2-alca52 Add AlCaReo stream for muon events
